description: Arc and Ariane set out for Olav in Rhoden Kingdom in search of slave traders. As they take a shortcut through the forest, they are attacked by the Hounted Wolves. Meanwhile, Yuriarna and her guards are attacked by assassins on their way to Limbult.

titles.title: A Miracle for the High-Minded Princess
Ein Wunder für die idealistische Prinzessin
Risou ni Moyuru Oujo ni Kiseki ga Maiorita
Un miracle pour la princesse pleine d’idéaux
理想に燃ゆる王女に奇跡が舞い降りた
